properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for a CMDB * * @author Erwan Taloc <erwan.taloc@combodo.com> * @author Romain Quetiez <romain.quetiez@combodo.com> * @author Denis Flaven <denis.flaven@combodo.com> * @license http://www.opensource.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html LGPL */

field.filter: SELECT Person AS p WHERE p.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkTeamToContact AS l ON l.contact_id=p.id JOIN Team AS t ON l.team_id=t.id WHERE t.id = :this->workgroup_id
SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkTeamToContact AS l ON l.contact_id=p.id JOIN Team AS t ON l.team_id=t.id WHERE t.id = :this->supervisor_group_id
SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkTeamToContact AS l ON l.contact_id=p.id JOIN Team AS t ON l.team_id=t.id WHERE t.id = :this->manager_group_id

method.comment: /** * Get the icon representing this object * @param boolean $bImgTag If true the result is a full IMG tag (or an emtpy string if no icon is defined) * @return string Either the full IMG tag ($bImgTag == true) or just the path to the icon file */

menu.oql: SELECT Change WHERE agent_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed", "resolved")
